name: IntoTheMaze
description:
This game was made in 48 hours and is a submission to the VoidStartPlay-Gamejam. The theme was inspired by this quote:

Escape(); Once you learn the maze or see the labyrinth whole, then, elaborate chaos is transformed into pattern. _The Idea of the Labyrinth, Penelope Reed Doob

You control the maze with the joysticks of your XBox controller. Puzzle the ball through the maze to the black tile that marks the ending.
